casebody.data:
IN RE: Nomination Petitions of Mallory B. SCOTT, Candidate in the Democratic Primary for the 127th State Legislative District Appeal of: Mallory B. Scott No. 12 MAP 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. Submitted: April 13, 2018
Decided: April 23, 2018 Kathleen Marie Kotula, Esq., Pennsylvania Department of State, for Department of State, Participants. Gary Lane Dorsett, Esq., for Appellant. William Hugh Andring, Esq., for Appellee.

ORDER

PER CURIAM

AND NOW, this 23 rd day of April, 2018, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
